column3: /hide:1/ /setAsFirst:Zeffron Drix/ /setAsSecond:Fairy Warrior/
Everything in this world is made of Essence.
From flowers; to people; to magic.
As descendants of those who survived the Great Cataclysm....
It is our duty to protect it./setAsFirst:Fairy Assassin/ /setAsSecond:Zeffron Drix/
Where you followed?/reveal:1/
Huh; whats going on here? /setAsSecond:Fairy Warrior/
I don’t think so.
So what are we doing out here?
The Vamperriti are auctioning off the Book of Transference tonight./setAsSecond:Zeffron Drix/

column1: -The camera is over Zeffron’s right shoulder and shows two fairies arguing. When they mention the book the camera switches to Zeffron’s face of shock/concern.

column3: The book of …. Isn’t that one of the forbidden spellbooks?/setAsSecond:Fairy Warrior/
Wait; what? The Book of Transference?
Yeah the book that lets you transfer anything! Bodies; memories; you name it./setAsSecond:Zeffron Drix/
I can’t let the book fall into the wrong hands./setAsSecond:Fairy Warrior/
I do have one question. Why me? Why didn’t you grab Ivory?
Oh; that’s easy. I need you to make us a portal.
-- to make us a portal in; you are the best with portals./setAsSecond:Zeffron Drix/
It’s going to be tough because I’ve never been inside. /hide:1//setAsFirst:Zeffron Drix/
Dammit; I can’t let those two steal that book.
Who knows what carnage those Dark Fairies will do with that kind of power.
No sign of those two Dark Fairies. Guess I’ll just have to--
Got you now!
Was that who I think it is?
clear
